WRITING.TEXT: If you need phage and black cleaver is - for some reason - not an option, yeah, tri force. Also get triforce if you're ahead. If your in any situation but those you want to get ibg simply because it gives you SOME cc and survivability (well yeah, and costs less)

No reason to play ap ezreal tbh, it's good if you're smurfing because the burst is high, but when I'm going ap it still feels like im going ad, mainly because i get hextech revolver -- sheen -- lich bane -- gunblade, and max r-q-e-w So not much difference for me atleast (ofc after those core items i get ap but still

First of all, gold and silver are literally the same rank. I'm not saying that because I want to boost your confidence but because it's actually true.
Can Ezreal carry? Yes. Ezreal can most definitely carry games, to back that statement up I have 62%+ W/R on 2 accounts with 110 games on other and 52 games on the other one, Ezreal can carry and is definitely fit to do that.. (plat 1 and plat 2, neither of them is a smurf)
While Ezreal might not hurt as much as the hypercarries, he definitely still does if ahead, and to make things easier in bronze-gold you can win your lanes by focusin on last hitting. Also when you're ahead people will most likely try to dive you through your team and your e flash will most likely save you.
When playing Ezreal in lower elos (if not smurfing, obviously.) you can use few simple tips to win Dont poke with your autoattacks, don't e in, go for perfect cs and 0 deaths. Those will help you start off and when you get better with the matchups etc. you can develop your own style
Oh. So you're pretty fucking good. XD thanks for explaining 3

Oh, thanks, quick and good response :D! How much have you played and how 'good' are you (dont know how people rank others in this game etc.)? You had some insanely consistent (or so it seemed after watching this) headshots, especially the ones where someone is falling are super hard for me even though I consider my aim to be good :D

I'd love one aswell. The game runs well enough approx. 80 fps min. But I just don't like the way it looks, high graphics was horrible, low was bit better but I'd want even "worse" looking details if possible. Thanks in advance

The game looks so fucking beautiful for you D: How come I can't get it to look like this, currently I play on max reso min settings but it stills looks a bit too ''good'' for me? Also what merc is this and what card (I'm really new so dunno what they're called haha)

I would get into rs3 if i could reset my account, starting now with a 90 combat account (was 94 when eoc came idk what i'm now :D..) makes no sense since the game has a lot more content and depth. The game is different but not necessarily bad. Feels stupid that the communities shit on each others still today.

No, EoC was an awful idea. No matter how you look at it.. It really doesn't matter how it turned out changing a core aspect of a game is NEVER a good idea if you wish to maintain the playerbase. Removing the combat the game had had for it's entire lifespan EVEN AFTER RECEIVING THE FEEDBACK was stupid, no1 can deny that. Then again EoC lead to osrs so I can't really complain, it's just a shame that we COULD have a game that's better than neither of the ones available now. (although we could also have a game that's dead and no1 wants to play)
Check the price of black knives while you're at it. Common drop while getting defenders so they might be cheap, dont know though but worth checking :)
Yeah, will do that from now on when the time feels right. And usually there are some 100+ lvl people playing so they can help with stuff like 'where is this place' etc.
Am i the only one who realized what fuze is used for and didnt kill the hostage with it?

Yeah, I'm just kinda not sure what the diamond people do better than the gold or plat people, since it's not about aim. I'm 100% sure that my aim at the moment is good enough to be diamond, but I'm nowhere near as good as they so I gotta figure out what they do better and then I can improve :)
That could actually be super good, thanks for the tip I'll definitely do that!

Alright, that explains. Not that I really care about ranks tbh, I mean after being pretty high rank in several games I just focus on getting better instead of getting high rank, it goes higher up eventually that way :)
Thanks though

WRITING.TITLE: Just started, how are the ranks?
WRITING.TEXT:
Yeah, so I've played the game for good 20-40 hours (rank 48 at the moment) and I've started thinking that the game seems to have very small amount of ranks?
So basically my question is, that how big skill difference is there between gold and diamond and how can it be measured well? For me it seems like only thing holding me back is the knowledge (I still haven't even learned the damn maps). I used to be Global in csgo so maybe my gunskills are a bit better than average beginner, but after reaching gold pretty much instantly and having not-so-hard time playing against platinum players I just keep wondering how much will the level increase after platinum 3 or so?

Definitely suggest it if you enjoy tactical games/shooters/tactical shooters/hard games
so yeah, it's like a.. (hopefully people get the reference and don't get mad at me) its kinda like a more sophisticated csgo, if you get what i mean. That can probably be missunderstood really easily but if atleast one person understands me im happy haha.

I feel like its useful for me.
That being said I've played for ~30 hours and need to learn the maps, I can imagine it being frustrating to veteran players who would just like to cycle through fast. Maybe a toggle option in 'Quality of life' section in settings or something? Other stuff could be added aswel (no suggestions atm but im sure there are plenty)
Edit: One came to mind, maybe clicking the actual spawning points instead of the text, would make it like 1-3 seconds quicker for me. Nothing major but definitely QoL
Aight, thanks for giving another point of view to this.
Well yea, its just like, it wouldn't bring me down because even though they're like my closest friends I don't care.

I think i'd still want some :/ Feels kinda strange in public places when something 'horrible' happens and everyones freaking out but im just there not giving a fuck or something. And the thing is that i dont know if this is common either, hopefully it is?

Yea I have some friends who're kinda feeling down, not completely sure if i'd say depressed since it's kinda different than just feeling down as far as i understand. Just trying to ignore it and act like they werent, but ofc im kinda asking more how they feel. Its just so strange, because i feel like i NEED to ask them how they feel, not because i actually care but because i've known them for a long time, feels like something that's just my ''chore'' to do or whatever. I also dont really care about people anymore, i feel like im going through some second 'teen angst' phase, exept now its not that i ''hate my parents or my life'' its just that i dont really care. I still do stuff im supposed to and am nice to people like im supposed to, but its different. Hard to explain and probably even harder to understand.
Yeah i thought so too, and the problem is that i dont know? Does it? I guess it doesnt, i just feel kinda strange knowing this :/
Is everything okay?

WRITING.TITLE: I'm lacking empathy, anyone else?
WRITING.TEXT:
So yeah I'm nearly 18 year old guy and I feel like I'm seriously lacking empathy. I feel like im lacking feelings in general.. Im certainly not depressed and i do feel stuff, happy sad etc. But whenever listening to on of my friends open up about a situation that's super fucked up i simply dont KNOW how they feel i can understand it, but i just cant say shit like ''i feel you'' because i simply dont.
I don't feel anything when watching super graphic videos either, like someone getting killed beheaded etc. (yes, i've actually watched quite a bit of them and dont get me wrong im not some sick fuck who enjoys it i've just tried to find something that makes me feel something)
Ive thought thus far that its just the lack of life experience, after all im still pretty young and all, but recently ive just started noticing others feel stuff around me that i dont feel.
It hasnt just recently started either, my grandfather who was really close to me died like 4 years ago or something and when i heard it i had absolutely no emotional reaction to it, my mind literally said 'ok' and moved on? Obviously i tried to act shocked since my dad told me it and so on but i dont know if he realized that i felt nothing or not..
Im kinda lost with this? What should i do? Am i ok? Also, sorry if this doesn't belong here since im not actually depressed, im kinda lost, will delete if needed.
ps. Thanks greatly to anyone who even read it.
yeah sounds smart, shiv could actually be really good since ezreal lacks waveclear
Oh, because it's KINDA ''low'' level content and hci-mode makes more people do low level content and brings up these issues :P
Why would it what?
I'd say a pretty big problem with that build is that you can only get one crit if that. Maybe prioritize lifesteal at that point?
Imagine of some fucker got zammy book from easy clue. THE WHOLE FUCKING BOOK.

Well you can do homework while afking monkfish/lobs, there are ways to get a lot more xp if you want to. Personally, i'd never choose xp over gym or friends but that's just me (not trying to be a cunt, if you want to play, play. Its all your opinion :) )
I think you should just get 99 fishing, then like 5 wc fletch etc. and do wintertodt for 99. Then qc? Not sure since idgaf but ya, that seems like the best way, correct if wrong. :)

No, that doesn't equal playing efficiently :). You're correct in a sense that if you're going for maxed account then yes, that is, by far, the most efficient way. However if your goal is to reach high ranks then that's not the case. I'm sure you knew this though :P

The people who are better than you know 100% what they're doing. None of them, and I mean NONE of them are doing the stuff for the first time and most of them follow a clear path. Also, if you want to compare you and them, you should find out ''efficient hours played'' and i don't mean the elitist circlejerk term, i mean that compare the hours where you've actually done stuff and had a clear goal :P I bet you're doing just fine. :)
And also, if you play because you enjoy the gaming experience and they play because they enjoy getting high ranks then obviously there's going to be difference.
If you need help with something just ask :) we're here. Gl bud
There is LITERALLY, and I mean LITERALLY no way to fall down if you use your brains.
I wish you could download rs as single player game and actually play proper ironman mode. Be the _ONLY_ one there. Would be more interesting than the ''kinda like ironman'' mode atm :)
Surely has nothing to do with HCI :^) Not that I don't think it's a great idea! I was actually suprised to see this isn't a thing.

Because I want something that has mixed damage, burst, poke and isn't reliant on pressure applying support. If my platinum support decides that he's playing jungle instead of support and spends the first 20 minutes roaming between mid and top i can just get tear and farm. Ezreal also just works for me, despite people saying he's hard I've pretty much never had lower than 60% wr on him and I've played approx 300 ranked games all together. (now obviously there's the point that I dont quite feel like im in the elo where i belong since i always get placed super low at the start of the season and that kinda fucks with my w/r.

That build just seems more of a hybrid ezreal than ap ezreal. I'd leave out tear completely since ap ezreal already has shitty enough early :P Just get sheen as early as possible then morello and then go from there

WRITING.TITLE: Cleaver/Gunblade?
WRITING.TEXT:
Yeah so I've pretty much never built either of these on ezreal, but was wondering when I should get them? I feel like cleaver after last whisper if playing against hard armor team (so like core items, vamp, lw, cleaver bork and so on), but when would i ever get gunblade?
Played ezreal for around 300 games but i've just never tried these 2. The reason I started being interested is that when i tried it I had a lot better time playing against tanks and they couldn't catch me and if they could they just didn't have enough damage to kill me :P
Would assume they're new and inexperienced people who don't trust their own skills.
How about just 'Ezrealmain'
How about the q dealing like 50% extra damage (could be tweaked till balanced). I think it could add interesting twist to ezreal :P
The combat system, the pay to win aspect, the level of the content, the feeling of unoriginality i get when i play it the fact that mods decide what comes into the game.
So because a game has 3 aspects that I enjoy I automatically like it? Alrighty.
Because I don't enjoy either of the games.

.. ? 'Which is which' I just told him which is which lol
Being able to complete a task while the game pretty much ''plays itself'' (i assume you get what i mean) means you're afking something. Having a 5 second window between clicks however does not make it ''afk''.

I don't understand how fast=easy it makes no sense in this concept. Obviously knowing something well and being able to complete a task or whatever faster than before means that it's gotten easier for you, but runescape is easy. Clicking a teak tree and dropping logs when you're full inv is not hard. 1 tick pray flicking saradomin or something on the other hand is..

Why do you not want there to be afk methods for skills like fm, that would be slower. Some people don't have the time. It's kinda sad that people don't want to make skills less apm because it ''devalues'' their ''accomplishments'' It's not an accomplishment to click a tree 150k times, and if you do something hard in the game and it gets easier after time then how does that devalue your ''accomplishment''? You managed to do it while it was hard. Kinda like killing some wow raid bosses when they weren't nerfed (dont know too much about that but i'd assume ya'll know these games) it was super hard and just because its not anymore doesn't mean the ''accomplishment'' to kill it back then is devalued.
I'll never go tri--bork and skip manamune. Just not worth imho, it gives you so much damage and utility, ofc this has a lot to do with playstyle but still

Personally I dont get fervor anymore, I keep fucking up stacks because w wont get me any anymore and my playstyle just doesn't fit. So you might wanna give thunderlord's a try.
Other than that, yeah. Same shit. I find myself getting executioner's calling more often early on now but that could be just me getting into bad match ups or something idk.
Its a shitty one if 50% of time you're talking about afking stuff and 50% of the time you're talking about having low apm
I simply don't believe you. Proof please.
just open the door a bit, ask your mate to hold them there with a stick while you slowly open it until one of you gets to stick your hand in there. Should be fairly easy from that point on?

M8 I'm pretty sure something being afk means that you can complete other tasks while doing it =) I mean, i've only played for 1.5k hrs or so so i wouldn't know. If something doesn't require as much attention its just low apm stuff, afk means afk and agility isnt afk. Kinda like saying that 'rc is afk' no, its definitely not.

The game you're playing IS EASY. Not being easy is different. The game is easy. Something taking a lot of time doesn't make it hard. For example, if someone gave you a pen and told you to color a paper fully, you'd know it takes time but it'd also be easy as fuck.
